thread.title: Budget battle in Congress risks U.S. readiness

title: Budget battle in Congress risks U.S. readiness
text:
Budget battle in Congress risks U.S. readiness 9:54pm IST - 02:01 
Pentagon planners warn a series of short-term budget deals and delays are having a real impact on national defense.. Everything from shipbuilding to live fire exercises are getting pushed back or put on hold. The end result, military leaders worry, is a fighting force that's less ready and less well-equipped.   
Pentagon planners warn a series of short-term budget deals and delays are having a real impact on national defense.. Everything from shipbuilding to live fire exercises are getting pushed back or put on hold. The end result, military leaders worry, is a fighting force that's less ready and less well-equipped.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/01/06/budget-battle-in-congress-risks-us-readi?videoId=379353143&videoChannel=101
